extension.name: Naily's ArkTS Support
extension.description: OpenHarmony ArkTS language support for VS Code
sdk.install.title: Select OpenHarmony API version to install
sdk.install.placeHolder: Select OpenHarmony API version to install
sdk.install.alreadyDownloaded: OpenHarmony SDK {0} already downloaded, skip downloading...
sdk.install.incomplete: ⚠️ Incomplete <The SDK maybe not installed correctly, you can try to install it again.>
sdk.install.notInstalled: ❌ Not Installed <Not found in base SDK path>
sdk.install.mayBeIncomplete: ⚠️ The SDK may be incomplete, if you encounter problems, you can try to install it again.
sdk.install.mayBeError: ⚠️ The SDK may be error, if you encounter problems, you can try to install it again.
sdk.install.isSwitchToNewSdk.title: New SDK is downloaded, Switch global settings to new OpenHarmony SDK {0}?
sdk.install.isSwitchToNewSdk.success: Switch to new OpenHarmony SDK {0} successfully.
sdk.install.isSwitchToNewSdk.cancel: Cancel switch to new OpenHarmony SDK {0}. You also can switch to new SDK later in the IDE settings.
sdk.install.switchOrReinstall.switch.det: Switch to the new SDK will not affect the current project.
Reinstall the SDK will delete the current SDK and reinstall it.
sdk.install.switchOrReinstall.title: Switch or Reinstall OpenHarmony SDK {0}?
sdk.install.switchOrReinstall.switch.suc: Switch to new OpenHarmony SDK {0} successfully.
sdk.guess.switch.title: The current workspace likely use OpenHarmony SDK {0}, are you want to switch to this SDK?
sdk.guess.switch.success: Switch to new OpenHarmony SDK {0} successfully.
sdk.guess.install.title: The current workspace likely use OpenHarmony SDK {0}, are you want to install this SDK?
sdk.error.validSdkPath: OpenHarmony SDK path is not set in global IDE configuration and local workspace local.properties file, the ETS Language Server will not work properly.
sdk.error.SDKPathNotFound: OpenHarmony SDK path not found, please check the 'ets.sdkPath' in the IDE settings or the 'sdk.dir' in the local.properties file in the local workspace.
sdk.error.SDKPathNotDirectory: OpenHarmony SDK path must be a directory, please check the 'ets.sdkPath' in the IDE settings or the 'sdk.dir' in the local.properties file in the local workspace.
sdk.error.EtsComponentPathNotFound: OpenHarmony SDK 'ets/component' path not found, please check the 'ets.sdkPath' in the IDE settings or the 'sdk.dir' in the local.properties file in the local workspace.
sdk.error.EtsComponentPathNotDirectory: OpenHarmony SDK 'ets/component' path must be a directory, please check the 'ets.sdkPath' in the IDE settings or the 'sdk.dir' in the local.properties file in the local workspace.
sdk.error.EtsLoaderConfigPathNotFound: OpenHarmony SDK 'ets/build-tools/ets-loader/tsconfig.json' path not found, please check the 'ets.sdkPath' in the IDE settings or the 'sdk.dir' in the local.properties file in the local workspace.
sdk.error.EtsLoaderConfigPathNotFile: OpenHarmony SDK 'ets/build-tools/ets-loader/tsconfig.json' path must be a file, please check the 'ets.sdkPath' in the IDE settings or the 'sdk.dir' in the local.properties file in the local workspace.
sdk.error.choiceSdkPathMasually: Manually choose a OpenHarmony SDK path
sdk.error.downloadOrChoiceSdkPath: Download or choose a OpenHarmony SDK path
sdk.error.languageServerError: ArkTS Language Server Start Failed, please try to restart the IDE or check the OpenHarmony SDK path is correct. Error detail: {0}
configuration.ets.sdkPath.description: OpenHarmony SDK path. The ETS Language Server will be restarted when this setting is changed.
configuration.ets.baseSdkPath.descriptio: The default OpenHarmony SDK base path. All versions of SDKs will be installed under this path. (You can use `${os.homedir}` to get the home directory)
configuration.ets.hdcPath.description: The path to the HDC tool, used for `hilog` and others.
configuration.ets.hmsPath.description: The path to the HMS SDK path. Because HMS SDK is independent of OpenHarmony SDK, it needs to be set separately. Generally, you can find the SDK in the DevEco Studio installation directory.
configuration.ets.lspDebugMode.descripti: Enable ETS Language Server debug logging. Please do not enable it unless necessary, it may affect performance.
configuration.ets.ignoreWorkspaceLocalPr: Ignore auto infer the base SDK path from `local.properties` file in the local workspace.
ets.language-server.restart.reloadWindow: ETS Language Server restarted! If the internal lib have any error or uncorrect, you can click this button to reload window.
walkthroughs.ArkTS-Walkthrough.title: OpenHarmony ArkTS Setup
walkthroughs.ArkTS-Walkthrough.descripti: Help you setup OpenHarmony ArkTS development environment with your IDE.
walkthroughs.ArkTS-Walkthrough.steps.ins:
Install OpenHarmony SDK to support ArkTS development. 
[Install OpenHarmony SDK](command:ets.installSDK)
